name: Rhydon
flavorText:
Protected by an
armor-like hide,
it is capable of living in molten
lava of 3,600
degrees.

previous.name: Rhyhorn
previous.flavorText:
A POKéMON with a
one-track mind.
Once it charges,  it won't stop
running until it
falls asleep.

next.name: Chansey
next.flavorText:
A rare and elusive
POKéMON that is
said to bring happiness to those
who manage to get
it.

pokemon.name: Rhyperior
pokemon.flavorText:
It puts rocks in holes in its palms
and uses its muscles to shoot them.
GEODUDE are shot at rare times.
